channel.title: BriddingRSPS || Spawn economy || Fun || Brand new || Welcome
channel.description:
[center] [img]https://i.imgur.com/Ysh8Ld0.png[/img]
[B]ABOUT Bridding[/B] Hello and welcome guest,
This server is based on pking, All you have to do is register, log-in & you'll be rewarded with a unique starter package where you'll be set as an automatic pker.. Either it's bridding or melee combat. {you choose your combat style} We have many goals to complete, but our first goal is to keep our player's happy and watch the server grow. The server is spawn but some items such as godswords are ONLY obtained through saving your pk points and buying them from the pkpstore & much much more to be achieved through pkpoints.
[u]Features: [/u] -PKing?
[b]Links:[/b] [url=http://www.bridding.pw]Website[/url] [url=http://www.bridding.pw/Bridding.jar]Download[/url]
[b]Media:[/b] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/20peak..png[/img] [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/if29dz.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/FIRSTV.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/FIRSTV2.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/ooz.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/oro.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/oro1.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/oro2.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/oioioi.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/oioioi1.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/dmace.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/dmace1.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/dmace2.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/dmace3.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/dmace4.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/dmace5.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/dmace6.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/dmace7.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/dmace8.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/dmace9.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/dmace10.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/FIRSTV1.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/multi%20run%20in.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/multi%20run%20in1.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/pkri.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/pkri1.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/pkri2.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/pkri3.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/pkri4.png[/img] [B]More media later[/B]
[/center]
